title: 1. Kolaru Pathigam - Verse 1
lines: Venus, Saturn, Rahu, Ketu, all these nine,
None of these will ever harm me,
By the grace of the Lord, they will only bring good.
meaning: The nine planets—Moon, Sun, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn, Rahu, and Ketu—
will not cause me any harm. By the Lord's grace, they will all bring only good results.

title: 2. Kolaru Pathigam - Verse 2
lines: Like the radiance of gold, the holy feet of the Lord,
Should always reside in my heart,
This Anthathi removes sorrow and brings happiness,
By the grace of the Lord, joy will increase.
meaning: Like the radiance of gold, the holy feet of the Lord should always reside in my heart.
This Anthathi removes sorrow and brings happiness. By the Lord's grace, joy will increase.
